task.title: Generate drawing views of the exploded representation

step.stepresult: You are prompted: Select objects or [Entire model/preseTs/Special views] <Entire model>:
You are prompted: Select view [Exploded view/Back] <Back>:
A dialog box to select the exploded representation appears.
You are prompted: Enter new or existing layout name to make current <Layout1>:

step.cmd: If applicable, enter the Layout name of the layout for the exploded representation.
Position the generated drawing views of the exploded representation in the paper space layout.

postreq.note: To use balloons (see command BMBALLOON) with drawing views of exploded representations, the GENERATEASSOCVIEWS system variable must be ON.
